Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class GameReport

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GameReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameReport extends Object implements Serializable
The class GameReport represent an object containing the state of the game, so is a class principally made of attributes and getters

  • Constructor Details

    • GameReport

      public GameReport(String myId, String error, String turnOf, boolean finished)
      This method is the constructor of the class
      Parameters:
      myId - is the nickname that caused this report
      error - is a String containing a message of error
      turnOf - is a String containing the nickname of the player who has the turn
      finished - is a boolean that report if the game is finished

    • GameReport

      public GameReport(Game game, Player owner)
      This method is a constructor of the class
      Parameters:
      game - represent the game containing all the information to fill the report
      owner - is the player that will receive the game report

    • getLastMyCanteen

      public ArrayList<Integer> getLastMyCanteen()
      This method return an ArrayList containing the id of five students (one for every Colour) on the Player's Canteen. These id are needed in case the Player exchanges one of his/her Students with one Student on his/her Canteen.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of integer containing the id of the last Students of every table
